Question: This person told Kennedy he considered Laos to be "the cork in the bottle" with regard to the regional threat.
Hints: On January 17, 1961, this person gave his final televised Address to the Nation from the Oval Office.
This incident occurred during a cabinet meeting when this person suddenly found himself unable to speak or move his right hand.
Up until this event, this person felt he had been making progress towards better relations with the Soviet Union.
